scripts.start: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command $env:NODE_ENV='development'; $env:APP_NAME='%npm_package_name%'; Remove-Item ./dist/vendor -Recurse; Remove-Item ./dist/composer.*; composer install; gulp
scripts.build: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command $env:NODE_ENV='production'; $env:APP_NAME='%npm_package_name%'; Remove-Item ./dist/vendor -Recurse; Remove-Item ./dist/composer.*; Copy-Item ./app/composer.* -Destination ./dist; composer update -d ./dist; composer install -d ./dist; ./dist/vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=./phpcs.ruleset.xml --report=summary ./app -v; npx stylelint './app/snippets/**/*.scss' './app/resources/**/*.scss'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {exit 1}; npx eslint './app/resources/main.js' './app/resources/panel.js' './app/snippets/**/script.js'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {exit 1}; gulp; composer install -d ./dist --no-dev; Remove-Item ./dist/composer.*
